org.pac4j.core.profile

Class UserProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.profile.UserProfile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonProfile

    public class UserProfile
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class is the user profile retrieved from a provider after successful authentication : it's an identifier (string) and attributes (objects). The attributes definition is null (generic profile), it must be defined in subclasses. Additional concepts are the "remember me" nature of the user profile and the roles and permissions associated.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
